titleStmt.title: The mysterie of the true ministry unvailed as it was to be before, under, and shall be after Antichrists time, and the unlawfulness of the call of the now ministry. By a witness of the gospel, John Brayne.
titleStmt.author: Brayne, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: and are to be sold in Popes-head Alley,
